prompt: How many flavors of coke are there?
response:
There have been numerous flavors of Coca-Cola over the years. Here are some of them:

1. Coca-Cola Classic (also known as Coca-Cola Original or simply Coke)
2. Diet Coke
3. Coke Zero Sugar
4. Cherry Coke
5. Vanilla Coke
6. Coke with Lime
7. Coke Life (sweetened with stevia and sold in some countries)
8. Coca-Cola Energy (with caffeine and other energy-boosting ingredients)
9. Coca-Cola Energy Zero Sugar
10. Coca-Cola Caffeine Free
11. Coca-Cola Zero Caffeine
12. Coca-Cola Cherry Vanilla
13. Coca-Cola Energy Cherry
14. Coca-Cola Energy Zero Sugar Cherry
15. Coca-Cola Cinnamon (a limited-edition flavor released in the UK)
16. Coca-Cola Winter Spiced Cranberry (a limited-edition flavor released in the UK)
17. Coca-Cola Orange Vanilla
18. Coca-Cola Energy Orange Vanilla
19. Coca-Cola Energy Zero Sugar Orange Vanilla
20. Coca-Cola Peach (released in Japan)
21. Coca-Cola Raspberry (released in the UK)
22. Coca-Cola Lemon (released in some countries)
23. Coca-Cola Lime Rickey (released in Japan)
24. Coca-Cola Green Tea (released in Japan)
25. Coca-Cola Yuzu (released in Japan)
26. Coca-Cola Sakura (released in Japan, cherry blossom flavor)
27. Coca-Cola C2 (a lower-calorie version of Coke, released in some countries)
28. Coca-Cola Blak (a coffee-flavored Coke, released in some countries)
29. Coca-Cola with Coffee (released in some countries)
30. Coca-Cola Energy with Coffee

And that's not an exhaustive list, as Coca-Cola frequently releases limited-edition flavors and collaborations with other brands.
